definition: to discuss guidelines/to discuss principles to be followed
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

sentences.english: German Army retreats to the Hindenburg Line.
sentences.chinese: 德国陆军务虚的兴登堡线。

sentences.english: These were used for masses, retreats , and meetings as well.
sentences.chinese: 这些被用于群众，务虚会，并举行会议，以及。

sentences.english: Retreat and pragmatic is a thing of the two aspects.
sentences.chinese: 务虚与务实是一个事物的两个方面。
年度成员会议和务虚会。

sentences.english: It is a form of retreat for Christians preparing to celebrate the paschal mystery.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个形式的务虚会的基督徒准备庆祝复活节的谜。

definition: to sing the high part/to speak fine sounding but empty words (idiom)
to sit and pontificate; to find answers through theory and not through practice (idiom)
lit. to build a cart behind closed doors/to be overly subjective and disregard the outside world (idiom)
to work industriously/to get things done
(of a writing etc) to have no substance (idiom)/to carry no weight
a mountain of paperwork and a sea of meetings (idiom)
